DOC.brief_summary: Study investigate safety efficacy daily use JARDIANCE速 Tablets Japanese elderly patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Daily Use JARDIANCE速 Tablets Japanese Elderly Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female elderly patient ( age 65 ) type 2 diabetes mellitus never treat JARDIANCE速 Tablets enrolment start take JARDIANCE速 Tablets within 3 month launch Japan Exclusion criterion :
